name: RetroRift
description:
If you have issues with resolution/sound in the HTML build, try using this build https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xxb4stPLD0f8-R8bqBamWpiCCXi_Mg8v/view?usp=shari... (nothing changed, only sound fixes)
-------------
Your goal is simple: reach the portal. But in order to complete the level you need to do it twice. In the second run the portal will be spawning your clones that travel back in time and repeat your past actions so be careful.

Controls

  • Arrow keys - move/jump
  • C - jump
  • R - restart level

Use left/right brackets to skip levels

Art @Raindrinker, Code @FreezedIce

Music

Ouroboros by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4996-ouroboros
